vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀλφαῖος (WH, Ἀλ-), -ου, ὁ (Aram. חַלְפַּי)
Alphæus.
__1. Father of Levi: Mrk.2:14.
__2. Father of James: Mat.10:3, Mrk.3:13, Luk.6:15, Act.1:13.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.10.3;
father of: James (G2385H), Judas (G2455)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: Alfeo: (1) padre de Santiago (MAT.10:3); (2) padre de Leví (MAR.2:14)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞勒腓 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來字的意思是 "變化"
1) 收稅人利未的父親(可 2:14)
2) 被稱為小雅各的父親, 這位雅各是使徒之一
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚勒腓这个阳性专有名词在希伯来字的意思是"变化"
1) 收税人利未的父亲(可2:14)
2) 被称为小雅各的父亲, 这位雅各是使徒之一
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: A-phê « Thay đổi » Có lẽ là « tạm thời ». 1/ Cha của Sứ đồ Gia-cơ và 2/ cha của Sứ đồ Ma-thi-ơ, tức là Lê-vi, người thâu thuế. H02501

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Mrk.2.14;
father of: Matthew (G3156)
